data.Title: Google Core Update Expected in Coming Weeks
data.Description: Google has announced that the next core update to its search algorithm is expected to roll out in the coming weeks.

data.Title: Google Tests AI-Powered Features for Search and Local Results
data.Description: Google is experimenting with new AI-driven features, including AI-organized local search results and the return of the "Back to AI Overview" button.

data.Title: Google Business Profile Chat Feature Discontinued
data.Description: Google has removed the chat feature from Google Business Profiles. Users are advised to download their chat history as it will no longer be accessible.

data.Title: Google's Web Crawler Enhances JavaScript Rendering
data.Description: Google's web crawler now simulates "idle" states to improve the rendering of JavaScript-heavy websites, leading to better indexing of deferred content.

data.Title: Google Notes Experiment Ends
data.Description: Google has officially ended its Search Labs experiment, "Notes on Search," which allowed users to add notes to search results.

data.Title: Google Discover Content Exclusion for Publishers
data.Description: Google is considering giving publishers the ability to exclude specific content from appearing in Google Discover feeds.

data.Title: Google's AI Overviews Feature Sees Changes
data.Description: Google's AI Overviews feature is undergoing changes, with reports indicating a decrease in citations from Reddit and Quora.

data.Title: Taboola Partners with Apple for Native Advertising
data.Description: Taboola has secured a deal with Apple to power native advertising within the Apple News and Apple Stocks apps.

data.Title: AI Training Datasets Raise Copyright Concerns
data.Description: An investigation reveals that AI models from companies like Apple, Nvidia, and Anthropic were trained on datasets containing copyrighted material, including YouTube video transcripts.

data.Title: Google Search Console Updates and Features
data.Description: Google Search Console has introduced new features, including the ability to configure shipping and returns information directly within the platform.

data.Title: Schema.org Receives Design Refresh
data.Description: Schema.org has undergone a design update, featuring an improved validator and a refreshed look.

data.Title: Google's Disavow Tool: To Use or Not to Use?
data.Description: Experts discuss the relevance and necessity of using Google's Disavow Tool in 2024, with some arguing for its limited use.

data.Title: Majestic Removes Disavow Links Feature
data.Description: Majestic has removed its disavow links feature, prompting discussions about the future of disavow tools and their relevance in the SEO landscape.

data.Title: Google 3D/AR Images Expand to More Websites
data.Description: Google appears to be rolling out its 3D/AR image feature to a wider range of websites, beyond those initially included in the pilot program.
